DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this trial is to investigate the effect of multiple doses of flibanserin on the single dose pharmacokinetics of digoxin in healthy female and male volunteers. Digoxin is a narrow therapeutic index drug for which a large number of relevant drug-drug interactions are known. Flibanserin is now under evaluation in postmenopausal women which increases the likelihood that flibanserin and digoxin will be administered together in the clinical setting.
DOC.brief_title: to Evaluate Effect of Multi Doses Flibans 100 mg Film-c Tablets on Single Dose PK of Digoxin 0.5 mg, Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: healthy male and female subjects
